card.name: [OP] Yamato [ST09-001]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [Opponent's Turn] If you have 2 or less Life cards, this Leader gains +1000 power.

card.name: [OP] Uzuki Tempura [ST09-002]
card.text: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less and add this card to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Kaido [ST09-004]
card.text: [DON!! x1] If you have 2 or less Life cards, this Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle.

card.name: [OP] Kouzuki Oden [ST09-005]
card.text: [DON!! x1] This Character gains [Double Attack]. (This card deals 2 damage.) [On K.O.] You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.

card.name: [OP] Shinobu [ST09-007]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [On Block] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: This Character gains +4000 power during this battle.

card.name: [OP] Shimotsuki Ushimaru [ST09-008]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: Play up to 1 yellow {Land of Wano} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.

card.name: [OP] Fugetsu Omusubi [ST09-009]
card.text: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 1 or less and add this card to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Portgas.D.Ace [ST09-010]
card.text: [Once Per Turn] If this Character would be K.O.'d, you may trash 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards instead.

card.name: [OP] Yamato [ST09-012]
card.text: [When Attacking] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: This Character gains +2000 power until the start of your next turn.

card.name: [OP] Narikabura Arrow [ST09-014]
card.text: [Counter] If you have 2 or less Life cards, give up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards âˆ’3000 power during this turn. [Trigger] You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.

card.name: [OP] Thunder Bagua [ST09-015]
card.text: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 2 or less Life cards, add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less to the top or bottom of the owner's Life cards face-up. [Trigger] Draw 1 card.
